mapper.sql: id, job_accept_id, audit_name, audit_id, audit_result, node_name, job_opinion, VERSION, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, DELETED, ISVALIDE, unit_name
mapper.insert: insert into lshc_job_log (id, job_accept_id, audit_name, audit_id, audit_result, node_name, job_opinion, VERSION,CREATE_TIME, CREATE_ID, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_ID, DELETED, ISVALIDE,unit_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobAcceptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nodeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isvalide,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select audit_name as auditName,node_name as nodeName,job_opinion as jobOpinion,jl.audit_result as conclusion, to_char(jl.CREATE_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') as createDateStr, jl.unit_name as unitName from lshc_job_log jl inner join lshc_job_accept ja on jl.job_accept_id = ja.id where ja.service_num=#{serviceNum}
